author: CandleSmartHome.com
description: Visualizes the total energy use of your power monitoring devices.
name: Energy use

Device detail days.description: For how many days into the past would you like to see details about energy use per device? To protect privacy and avoid abuse, after at most 12 weeks (3 months) you will only be shown the daily total. Always discuss these settings with others in your home.

Data retention months.description: For how many months should data be stored? The maximum is 36 months (3 years). This is separate from any data logs your may create.

Authorization token.description: Advanced. To be allowed to get information on all your devices, you have to create an 'authorization' code. It's basically a very long password. You can generate it yourself under Settings -> Developer -> Create local authorization

Debugging.description: Advanced. Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
